info.headline: Extreme Heat Warning issued July 27 at 1:25PM EDT until July 28 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville FL
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 112. For the Extreme Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 114 expected.
* WHERE...Coastal Camden and Coastal Glynn Counties.
* WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until 7 PM EDT this evening. For the Extreme Heat Warning, from noon to 7 PM EDT Monday.
* IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events. Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction:
Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
Do not leave young children and pets in unattended vehicles. Car interiors will reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

parameter.value: HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...EXTREME HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM EDT MONDAY
